articles.title: Neil Young ditches Facebook over policies for AI chatbots and children
articles.summary: Neil Young announced on Thursday that he is leaving Facebook over Meta's internal policies regarding communications between artificial intelligence chatbots and children.

articles.title: The C.E.O. of Duolingo Wants to Have a Conversation About A.I.
articles.summary: The language-learning app with more than 100 million users has embraced artificial intelligence but has also faced consumer backlash for it.

articles.title: Neil Young Leaves Facebook After Its AI Chatbot Reportedly Had 'Romantic or Sensual' Conversations with Children
articles.summary: Neil Young is parting ways with Facebook in the wake of a report noting the social media giant’s internal policies on artificial intelligence allegedly enable bots to hold "romantic or sensual" chats with child users.
